amendment.description: Amendment sought to allow a State court to certify a class action after the Federal court to which the case had been removed had failed to act.
amendment.purpose: An amendment no. 2 printed in the Congressional Record to allow a State court to certify a class action after the action has failed to meet class certification under Rule 23 of the Federal Rules of Civil Procedure in a Federal court.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Frank (MA) amendment (A005) Failed by recorded vote: 202 - 225 (Roll no. 441).
